**Table of contents (updating)**

**Learn to walk**

*Prototype mover development.*

- [Project C-01: Motion I \[SUCCESS\]](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/121387-AAR-The-Illustrated-Book-of-the-KSA?p=1940667&viewfull=1#post1940667)

**Learn to fly**

*Prototype jet development.*

*Rocket flying tests.*

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Do you play without reverts? Anyway, itis an awesome idea

Yes TheKutKu.

It's not a real "hardcore" career as I've unlocked every tech from the start and basically I've really a lot of money. My intent is to create only fictional AAR, but with a little "unknown" given by the fact that, if something went wrong, it stays wrong.

Luckily these designs are very basic but I'm sure that soon a "FAILURE" sign will pop out!
These are soo cool, keep em coming!
Love the layout and presentation style. Have rep!
